doc.field: Record Group 11. Print matter (1881-2017; 79.25 linear feet)
Record Group 11. Print matter (1881-2017; 79.25 linear feet)

Friedrich Froebel's Pedagogics of the Kindergarten, translated by Josephine Jarvis, 1917. Living in a World of Science: Book Two, by Morris Meister, 1935. Inside Asia, by John Gunther, 1939. An Essay on Morals, by Philip Wylie, 1947. Education and Morals: An Experimentalist Philosophy of Education, by John L. Childs, 1950 (signed copy). Everyday Junior Mathematics, by William Betz, 1951. Toward an Understanding of the U.S.S.R., by Michael T. Florinsky, 1953. The Last Angry Man, by Gerald Green, 1956. The Ark of Noah: A Collection of Sermons, by Rabbi Noah Kaplan, 1957 (in Hebrew). Russia: A History and Interpretation Volume II, by Michael T. Florinsky, 1958. The Small Mosaics of Mr. and Mrs. Engel, by Patricia Collinge, 1959. Archaeology in the Holy Land, by Kathleen M. Kenyon, 1960. The Lifetime Reading Plan, by Clifton Fadiman, 1960. How to Get More for Your Money, by Sylvia Porter, 1961 (signed copy). Collected Poems, Basil Bunting, 1985
